content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Mr. Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment in Munich to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also affordable. I'm a student, so I'm on a budget. I'd like to pay around 700 Euros per month, all inclusive. Is that something we can work with?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: 700 Euros per month is a reasonable offer, considering you are a student and have a budget to adhere to. However, I must admit that the location of the apartment and the amenities it offers are quite competitive. Would you be willing to pay a little bit more to secure this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to consider my offer. While I understand that the apartment is well-located and offers good amenities, my budget is quite strict due to my student status. I'm looking for a place that not only meets my needs but also fits within my financial constraints. Is there any flexibility in the price you can offer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand your situation as a student, and I'm willing to work with you to find a solution that fits your budget. How about this: if you're willing to pay a slightly higher price, say 750 Euros per month, I can offer you a six-month lease with the possibility of extension, depending on your needs. This way, you can enjoy the comforts of the apartment without overstretching your budget. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
